name: Silicon Soldiers
description:
The only thing between the natives and the destruction of your livelihood is you.

In the desert outskirts of the metropolis Corpus your Collector must defend her miners by any means necessary.  Whether that’s by gunning down the local fauna or blocking their attacks with your own body all you're there for is silicon.

Fight or defend but you must complete your duty as a Silicon Soldier.

Made for Ludum Dare 46 with the theme of “keeping it alive”.
>>> LUDUM DARE 46 PAGE

Not hitting enemies?

If you are having trouble hitting enemies check to see if you are above 60Hz. Setting to 60Hz should solve this.

Credits
  • Sroxs [Itch] - Lead Design
  • Hueson [Itch] - Design / Programming
  • Sadripa [Itch /Twitter] - Art
  • Asiago [Bandcamp] - Music
  • Juuu [Soundcloud/Facebook] - Sound Effects

MacOSX/Linux builds are available but were not tested.
